name: Kids policeman
description:
In the world there are so many necessary and fascinating professions. But, perhaps, one of the most responsible and dangerous is the profession of a policeman, because the police always comes to the rescue at the most difficult moment. Are you ready to test yourself as a real detective? Are not you afraid of difficulties and dangers? Are you ready to try to triumph of justice? If yes, then we are happy to present you a new game from the series of developing games for children: "Kids policeman".
This game will take your kids to a real police station, in which serious work is boiling. Now you are a real children's detective who is ready to help everyone with whom a disaster has happened. And the criminal world has something to fear - the children's police are starting their work!
And your first task is to provide security at the airport. Become a scanner, check the suitcases and find all the things prohibited for transportation.
In the second task you are waited by the most real races on police cars. The criminal robbed the bank and tries to hide from you. Your police car is chasing. Take her past all obstacles encountered on the way, and catch a thief.
At the intersection the traffic light broke, a huge traffic jam was formed! It is necessary to regulate traffic. And you as a real regulator get down to business. But be careful! Do not allow a traffic accident, especially at a railway crossing.
And that is not all! You are waiting for other mini games with interesting tasks! Help the heroes of the game to find the missing items, catch the criminals hiding in an abandoned house, take part in the race with obstacles, because every police officer must be in good shape.
Play our games about the police! Enjoy colorful graphics and a pleasant musical accompaniment. Download the game police you can absolutely free.
